{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
template&lt; class Mutex &gt;
void swap( unique_lock&lt;Mutex&gt;&amp; lhs, 
           unique_lock&lt;Mutex&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Specializes the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::unique_lock}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|lock wrappers whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
